select id, name, email, company_name, company, user_desc, zhicheng, age_between, age, csrq, hyly_name, hyly, dz, byyx, sheng, shi, xian, je_count, zl_count, xm_count, jg_count, cg_count, jwd, DATA_CODE, SYS_FLAG, DATA_ORDER, STATUS, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_NAME, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, user_id from zjk_base_info where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and name like '%${name}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and company like '%${company}%'
and user_desc like '%${userDesc}%'
and zhicheng like '%${zhicheng}%'

and zl_count like '%${zlCount}%'
and xm_count like '%${xmCount}%'
and jg_count like '%${jgCount}%'
and cg_count like '%${cgCount}%'
and jwd like '%${jwd}%'
and DATA_CODE like '%${dataCode}%'
and SYS_FLAG like '%${sysFlag}%'
and DATA_ORDER like '%${dataOrder}%'
and STATUS like '%${status}%'
and DEL_FLAG like '%${delFlag}%'
and CREATE_DATE like '%${createDate}%'
and CREATE_USER like '%${createUser}%'
and CREATE_USER_NAME like '%${createUserName}%'
and UPDATE_DATE like '%${updateDate}%'
and UPDATE_USER like '%${updateUser}%'
and UPDATE_USER_NAME like '%${updateUserName}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'

and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
